text: Yeonsan Station () is a station of the Busan Metro Line 1 and Busan Metro Line 3 in Yeonsan-dong, Yeonje District, Busan, South Korea. ==Station Layout== ===Line 1=== {|style="text-align:center;" |- | ↑ |- || N/B S/B |- | ↓ |} {| border="1" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="3" frame="hsides" rules="rows" |- !
